name: Aurelia & Angular 2.0 Code Side by Side - Part 2
description: Yesterday I showed an example of Angular 2.0 code side-by-side with Aurelia [http://blog.durandal.io/2015/03/16/aurelia-and-angular-2-code-side-by-side/]. I showed the "reverse binding" technique for Angular 2.0. Today I'm going to show how the Angular 2.0 Forms Model [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1US9h0ORqBltl71TlEU6s76ix8SUnOLE2jabHVg9xxEA/] can be used instead. I'll also show Aurelia next to it, so you can see the difference. Both examples will use the same Contact model.
